scripts.clean: pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true && pkill -f 'npm start' || true && pkill -f 'ts-node-dev' || true && pkill -f 'react-scripts' || true
scripts.kill-ports: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.db:reset: cd packages/backend && npm run migrate:reset && npm run db:seed
